name: The DICE KNIGHT
description:
Fight off an endless hoard of goblins as dice rain from the sky! Every dice roll is a risk, but every risk might have a reward!

Every time you roll a die, it will trigger a modifier. Red die modify your strength, green die your dexterity, blue die your multiplier, and gold die your remaining time. But it is also possible you roll a lower stat than you had before, will you take that risk?

When time is up, it's game over! So be sure to roll that golden die!
